h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Captain Lotus-Vision
content: He can also start detonating a trail of explosions that follow you along the ground, but have a bigger indicator than the randomly placed explosions so you can outpace them by sprinting around and dodging.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Captain Lotus-Vision'.
The content is as follows:
He can also start detonating a trail of explosions that follow you along the ground, but have a bigger indicator than the randomly placed explosions so you can outpace them by sprinting around and dodging.
